医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员确定了 2 型糖尿病心脏病背后的关键机制2 型糖尿病患者患心血管疾病和因动脉粥样硬化而过早死亡的风险较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Researchers-identify-key-mechanisms-behind-heart-disease-in-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Researchers-identify-key-mechanisms-behind-heart-disease-in-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86d59a78-4202-4e08-8bed-c2e56023eaf1 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 20:30:39 -0500 Researchers identify key mechanisms behind heart disease in type 2 diabetes
研究提供了乳腺癌转移遗传倾向的第一个证据百分之九十的癌症死亡是由于癌症扩散，而不是原发肿瘤的并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Study-provides-the-first-evidence-of-genic-predisposition-to-breast-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Study-provides-the-first-evidence-of-genic-predisposition-to-breast-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0df8fb4-dbf7-4bbe-953d-a918d9b3dc94 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 20:25:35 -0500 Study provides the first evidence of genetic predisposition to breast cancer metastasis
新型葡萄糖敏感膜为糖尿病患者提供改善的胰岛素调节多年来，葡萄糖敏感膜一直是改善糖尿病治疗中受控胰岛素释放的关键焦点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Novel-glucose-sensitive-membrane-offers-improved-insulin-regulation-for-diabetic-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Novel-glucose-sensitive-membrane-offers-improved-insulin-regulation-for-diabetic-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b48c4b47-2a32-4d9e-98c0-b041624b1b7e Mon, 09 Dec 2024 20:21:12 -0500 Novel glucose-sensitive membrane offers improved insulin regulation for diabetic patients
在线培训可提高老年人的语音识别能力伦敦大学学院专家的研究发现，帮助人们识别和理解新声音的在线培训可能是帮助老年人改善日常环境中沟通的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Online-training-improves-voice-recognition-for-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Online-training-improves-voice-recognition-for-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d92bb639-9eec-49a6-bc8d-6e8eeaf9bc71 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 20:15:38 -0500 Online training improves voice recognition for older adults
研究发现锻炼可增强长达 24 小时的记忆力伦敦大学学院（UCL）研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，锻炼后大脑得到的短期提升会持续一整天。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Exercise-enhances-memory-for-up-to-24-hours-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Exercise-enhances-memory-for-up-to-24-hours-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d307019-43a8-4aa0-8bd0-fe68684dba8f Mon, 09 Dec 2024 20:10:16 -0500 Exercise enhances memory for up to 24 hours, study finds
运动神经元疾病的潜在新疗法显示出有希望的结果昆士兰大学旗下一家公司开发的一种潜在的运动神经元疾病（MND）新疗法在人体临床试验中取得了成功。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Potential-new-treatment-for-motor-neurone-disease-shows-promising-results.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Potential-new-treatment-for-motor-neurone-disease-shows-promising-results.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f33a0743-1ad0-4333-84e6-0aa8b61dc7f2 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 20:03:36 -0500 Potential new treatment for motor neurone disease shows promising results
父母的食物偏好与儿童的餐厅选择相关爱思唯尔发表在《营养教育与行为杂志》上的一项新研究调查了父母的食物选择价值观如何影响孩子在餐馆的饮食行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Parental-food-preferences-linked-to-childrens-restaurant-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Parental-food-preferences-linked-to-childrens-restaurant-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54bb7548-f4dd-4e64-8b84-7bc03fb91255 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 19:52:00 -0500 Parental food preferences linked to children's restaurant choices
研究：三分之一的美国老年人仍在与孤独作斗争一项新的全国性研究显示，美国老年人的孤独感和孤立感大多已恢复到大流行前的水平，但这仍然意味着超过三分之一的 50 岁至 80 岁的人感到孤独，几乎同样多的人感到孤独。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Study-One-third-of-older-Americans-still-struggle-with-loneiness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Study-One-third-of-older-Americans-still-struggle-with-loneiness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b0d3c9a-1ffa-40b6-b89e-650272703bd6 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 19:49:48 -0500 Study: One-third of older Americans still struggle with loneliness
新型药物组合显示出 CLL 治疗的希望一种新颖的、固定期限的药物组合——；由第二代 BTK 抑制剂（称为 acalabrutinib）和 BCL-2 抑制剂（venetoclax）组成，有或没有第三种血癌药物 -；丹纳法伯癌症研究所研究员 Jennifer Brown 博士代表试验研究人员在第 66 届美国血液学会 (ASH) 年会和博览会上报告，在慢性淋巴细胞白血病 (CLL) 患者中显示出深度和持久的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Novel-drug-combination-shows-promise-for-CLL-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Novel-drug-combination-shows-promise-for-CLL-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a0a1deb-da3d-40e3-965f-0d222fd12292 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 19:44:54 -0500 Novel drug combination shows promise for CLL treatment
眼球追踪研究发现自闭症患者独特的面部处理休斯顿大学心理学研究员杰森·格里芬（Jason Griffin）开创了测量眼球运动以了解自闭症谱系障碍的新方法，他报告说，自闭症儿童对面部的关注与其他儿童不同，尤其是在视觉处理的早期阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Eye-tracking-study-identizes-unique-face-processing-in-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Eye-tracking-study-identizes-unique-face-processing-in-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f22723ca-c0af-4e2e-afc1-19d639d2c291 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 19:40:45 -0500 Eye-tracking study identifies unique face processing in autism
